body_html:
import numpy as np
np.random.seed(0)  # make sure results are reproducible
import tensorflow as tf
tf.set_random_seed(0)  # make sure results are reproducible

The numpy part might not be necessary in your case.

body:
```
import numpy as np
np.random.seed(0)  # make sure results are reproducible
import tensorflow as tf
tf.set_random_seed(0)  # make sure results are reproducible
```

The numpy part might not be necessary in your case.
